alert.note: Alert for Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 12:15PM MDT until July 05 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Northwestern Gregory County in south central South Dakota... Southern Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 115 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Kimball to near Iona to near Witten, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Burke and Dallas around 155 PM CDT. Gregory and Platte around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Dixon In Gregory County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
